title: Fix landing page generation in llmService and wire it to the app

requirements.summary: Fix the landing page project type flow so that when a user selects 'Landing Page' in NewSessionPage and sends a message in ChatPage, the llmService returns a complete, working landing page scaffold instead of failing silently or producing no output
acceptanceCriteria: Selecting 'Landing Page' as project type and submitting a prompt in ChatPage produces a non-empty AI response with code files.
The llmService landing page template returns at least one code file (e.g., index.html or App.tsx) with a complete landing page scaffold.
The generated response includes a hero section, a features/highlights section, and a call-to-action.
No console errors or blank responses occur when the landing page project type is used.

file_operations.description: Fix the generateLandingPageResponse function to return a complete, working landing page scaffold with multiple code files. Ensure it returns a proper assistant message with fenced code blocks for index.html (or App.tsx) containing a hero section, features section, and CTA. The response must match the format expected by ChatPage's file extraction logic (triple backticks with filename).

Review and ensure the handleSend function correctly calls llmService.generateLandingPageResponse when projectType is 'Landing Page'. Verify that the file extraction logic properly parses the landing page response and updates the session files. Add error handling to catch and log any failures in the landing page generation flow.

requirements.summary: Ensure the landing page template in llmService.ts generates a visually polished scaffold that matches Noventra.Ai's dark theme (OKLCH color tokens, glassmorphism, Space Grotesk font) and includes sections: Hero, Features, How It Works, and CTA with appropriate copy about Noventra.Ai building any project app
acceptanceCriteria: The landing page template output contains Hero, Features, How It Works, and CTA sections.
Copy reflects that Noventra.Ai can generate any project type: full-stack apps, mobile apps, and landing pages.
Styles reference the existing dark theme color tokens and Space Grotesk font.
The generated scaffold is valid, renderable code.

file_operations.description: Update the generateLandingPageResponse function to produce a complete landing page scaffold with Hero, Features, How It Works, and CTA sections. The template must use OKLCH color tokens from frontend/src/index.css (--color-bg, --color-surface, --color-primary, etc.), glassmorphism utilities (glass-card, glass-darker), and Space Grotesk font. Include copy about Noventra.Ai being able to generate full-stack apps, mobile apps, and landing pages. Output the scaffold as either a single-page React component (App.tsx with Tailwind/CSS) or an HTML file with embedded styles that reference the existing design system.
